name: Aimee
description:
For Bitsy Jam April-May 2021!

A high concept, low-res escapist mishmash of... various things. I would be more specific, buuuuut I started making this game with only a vague idea of what was in store, and I would like you, the player, to go into it with a similar lack of expectations.

Music composed by me.
Music added using Borksy (by Ayolland) and  Bitsymuse (By David Mowatt).
Bitsy made by Adam LeDoux.
All characters in this game are fictional.
You can pet the dog.
